titles.title: Congratulating the Oregon State University Beavers baseball team for winning the 2006 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I College World Series.

bill.summary: Congratulates the Oregon State University Beavers baseball team for winning the 2006 National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I College World Series Championship.
